overview: Teen Karen (Khloe Kapri) is excited for a weekend of fun with her friend Sarah (Carter Cruise), but when she arrives at the holiday spot, Sarah's mother teasingly asks Karen if she has a boyfriend yet. Karen responds that she doesn't ... but Sarah's mother doesn't let it go. While this conversation is happening, Sarah's father grills in the background. Eventually she's lured into being fucked by her best friend's parents.
title: Second Parents
